title: old client aspects gone missing?
body: so i was a little sad when i couldnt find some of the stats i used to enjoy looking at on my client, like total kills and tower kills cs and total gold income things like that, i would love to see that again the amount of games won and loss is still there for each mode that i do love to see as well but i was looking for it after a few games and all i got was {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Luckily we still save most of that info! You should be able to find all of that and more by checking out our [**Privacy Website**](http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/) ^_^.
